How many people are affected by protein C deficiency ?,Mild protein C deficiency affects approximately 1 in 500 individuals. Severe protein C deficiency is rare and occurs in an estimated 1 in 4 million newborns.,GHR,protein C deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to protein C deficiency ?,"Protein C deficiency is caused by mutations in the PROC gene. This gene provides instructions for making protein C, which is found in the bloodstream
